53.title: Action Replay
53.plot: Astra Force face a new villain Rok Tok who has the power to manipulate time. Our heroes must take care of this villain and his rag tag gang before they run out of time.

54.title: Pipers Payback
54.plot: Kids all over the city are falling prey to a new app on their phones and tablets. Astra Force must find out who is behind this in order to save the kids.

55.title: Ring-a-Ling
55.plot: An alien ring with evil powers crash-lands on Earth. It is then discovered by Vigyaani who uses it to don the alter ego of a villain calling himself Angoothilaal.

56.title: The Sticker Stickup
56.plot: Astra Force come face to face with an ancient monster Azreal, who enslaves the warriors and beasts after defeating them in the battle. And this time he has his eyes on Astra Force.

57.title: My Friend Mullu
57.plot: Astra Force find themselves tending to the heir of an Alien Royal family after he crash lands on Earth. But this cute little alien prince takes a special liking to Tara and becomes her invisible guardian.

58.title: Gamma-A-Go-Go!
58.plot: When Natasha gets unlimited powers by finding the Gamma Stone, Astra Force try their best to both stop her and not to make her mad.

59.title: Dancing Turtle
59.plot: A giant dancing Turtle lands in Megapolis and starts destroying the city with its funky dance moves. Astra Force need to put both their heads and dance moves together for this one.

60.title: Socked!
60.plot: Astra Force face off an evil alien villain who can control other people's bodies using Voodoo dolls.

61.title: Monster Ink
61.plot: A popular ink brand is turning kids into monsters, and Astra Force have to diffuse this situation while doing their own homework.

62.title: BFFs
62.plot: Jabra Spider, a special alien arachnid can make its prey become a fan of the first person they see. Unfortunately, it bites Neal and he starts worshiping Natasha.

63.title: The Storyterror
63.plot: A strange villain is kidnapping children only after sending them in their favorite fairy tales.

64.title: Red Dragon
64.plot: A new restaurant in town is turning its patrons into fire spitting zombies.

65.title: Viral Fever
65.plot: Vigyaani introduces two new villains - Pappa G and G-tes; two giant bugs with powers to spread viral fever.

66.title: Brocolli Invasion
66.plot: Alien villain Broco-Lee is turning humans into cabbages and broccoli. Astra Force must defeat him before Neal is permanently turned into a vegetable that he despises.

67.title: Sumo Football
67.plot: A strange furry alien lands on earth and with it come a team of giant aliens that look like Sumo Wrestlers. Astra Force are now stuck between Sumo like aliens who have decided to play a football match on Earth.

68.title: Villain School
68.plot: A new villain The Headmaster opens a new school in the city that guarantees to teach tricks and tips to beat Astra Force.

69.title: Eclipso!
69.plot: They look like regular shadows but are deadly. Astra Force fight Grahano Aliens, the villains who could hide themselves in plain sight.

70.title: Vigyaani vs Vigyaani (Duplicates)
70.plot: Vigyaani creates his own clone, but it backfires on him and the new and smarter Vigyaani sets out to dominate the world for himself.

71.title: From Hero to Zero
71.plot: Kids are vanishing after playing a particular video game. Astra Force decide to find out the villain behind this.

72.title: And Chubbies
72.plot: A crazy alien named Al Chubby is kidnapping humans to make them his slaves.

73.title: Jiiggy and Lolo
73.plot: Vigyaani kidnaps a baby alien who has the power to decimate the whole city, and he uses it to attack Astra Force. But our heroes have a compassionate trick up their sleeves.

74.title: Shadow Adventures
74.plot: With his new invention, Vigyaani can break anybody's shadow free from their body and make it do his bidding. This time Astra Force are fighting to win their shadows back.

75.title: No G
75.plot: An alien who can control all the gadgets is attacking the Earth, and Astra Force are the only thing that stands between him and humanity.

76.title: Arrest Warrant
76.plot: Two Space Officers are after Astra Force after they are seen looting and plundering various planets. But when our heroes face the charges, they have no idea what is going on.

77.title: Jail House Rocks
77.plot: After learning about a power that could make him the strongest, Zukaan escapes the space prison. But Astra Force take the help of an unusual ally to bring him back in.

78.title: Furry Current
78.plot: The Cats from Biloori Planets are back and this time, they are kidnapping all the cats of our planet for their devious and electrifying scheme.

79.title: Hot and Cold
79.plot: Vigyaani sends Astra Force into the future where Earth is too hot and the humanity is about to be scorched. How will they save themselves and their home planet this time?

80.title: Spelling Bugs
80.plot: The alien bees are again looting the city, but this time there is more than what meets the eye.

81.title: Spacenapped
81.plot: A shape shifting alien Roomo is out to get Astra Force and turn them into his personal henchmen.

82.title: Remote Control
82.plot: Captain Zukaan controls Astra's body using a special device and makes him commit crimes for him.

83.title: What Happened to Astra Force?
83.plot: Astra Force are no more, and the villains fight to take the credit of their destruction.

84.title: Freeze
84.plot: Rok Tok returns with a device that could freeze time, but is double crossed by his minions, the Baawla Brothers. Now he seeks Astra Force's help to put an end to Baawla Brother's reign of terror.

85.title: Clone War
85.plot: Tara accidentally gets cloned, but the real problem arises when the clone decides to take real Tara's place and eliminate her.

86.title: Pet Attack
86.plot: The humans are behaving like cats before mysteriously disappearing into thin air. And while Astra Force look all over for the culprit behind all this, the agent of evil is right under their nose.

87.title: Prison Break
87.plot: Bada Ulra gets his hands on the Alpha Particle, that could help him dominate the world.

88.title: Lost & Found
88.plot: The Go Go Aliens are back and this time they are stealing music from Earth.

89.title: Statue Game
89.plot: The Collector returns to get even with Astra Force, and he wants them to be in his collection or the whole humanity will take their place.

90.title: To Be Deleted
90.plot: Vigyaani invents a special computer that he could use to delete real things from the comfort of his chair.

91.title: Eye in the Sky
91.plot: Astra Force are targeted by a UFO that is making them see things that aren't really there.

92.title: Troublestone
92.plot: Pangoon gets his hands on a stone that brings bad luck who is holding them, and then he sets out to defeat Astra Force.

93.title: Breaking the News
93.plot: Astra Force faces a new problem when their local news channel starts demonizing them.

94.title: Super Natasha
94.plot: Vigyaani's attempt to make himself super smart backfired when his 'smart ray' accidentally hits Natasha. The newly turned genius Natasha then starts resolving all of Earth's problem and she thinks Astra Force is one of those.

95.title: Food Fight
95.plot: The alien Ninja twins Bobu and Nobu are back and this time they are stealing all of Earth's food in ninja style.

96.title: A Whale of a Time
96.plot: A big problem lands in Megapolis, a 100 tonnes big to be exact. And now Astra Force need to deal with this before Daaku Daddy and his gang of space bandits wreck havoc.

97.title: The Collector
97.plot: An alien is collecting all the interesting species from all over the universe and his next target is Earth.

98.title: Epic Warrior
98.plot: Vigyaani creates a Time Warrior Machine that could bring out the warriors from ancient and medieval times. And like any other of his inventions, he uses it against Astra Force.

99.title: No Fear
99.plot: The city of Megapolis drowns in terror when everyone's worst fears start coming true to life. Astra Force will now not only have to save the city but also face their deep hidden fears.

100.title: The Earth Encounter
100.plot: Astra Force wake up one day and find that their whole planet is missing. With their house floating in the dark infinite space they now have to find a way home.

101.title: The Haunted House
101.plot: During a trekking competition, Astra Force and their friends find themselves in the middle of a ghostly invasion of strange aliens. Our heroes now have to save their friends, defeat the aliens and win the competition.

102.title: What's on Your Mind?
102.plot: A strange device falls on earth from the deep space that could translate the hidden meaning behind a person's thought. Astra Force end up giving this device to Vigyaani before they learn how dangerous it is.

103.title: Happy Birthday Astra - Part 1
103.plot: In the season finale, Astra Force face their most sinister villain and darkest fears. With several dreadful villains aiding the mysterious big boss, our heroes are joined by some of their trusted super friends.

104.title: Happy Birthday Astra - Part 2
104.plot: In the season finale, Astra Force face their most sinister villain and darkest fears. With several dreadful villains aiding the mysterious big boss, our heroes are joined by some of their trusted super friends.

1.title: Kung Fu Fury
1.plot: The Manchula Aliens invade the Earth to test its prowess by fighting its strongest people. They end up bashing all the wrestlers and fighters until they come up against Astra Force.

2.title: Environ-mental!
2.plot: A cranky scientist Sanki Raam, makes trees and plants animated, and they turn against the humans. How will Astra Force save the city from the plants and trees?

3.title: Go Go Aliens
3.plot: A gang of thieving aliens attack Earth and they are robbing us blind. Astra Force take the fight to these thieves as they try to get back the stolen goods.

4.title: The Munchies Attack!
4.plot: Garbage eating aliens come to Earth, but when all the garbage is eaten, they start eating everything else too.

5.title: Angry Young Monster
5.plot: Thanks to Vigyaani, Neal turns into a big furry monster whenever he gets angry. So now Astra and Tara have to find the cure while keeping him happy all the time.

6.title: Going Ape
6.plot: As Vigyaani kidnaps and sends his Gorillas to attack the city, Astra Force try all the tactics to make them stop.

7.title: The Zoo
7.plot: Neal decides to quit Astra force and audition to become the sidekick for a new vigilante. Little did he know that the vigilante had ulterior motives.

8.title: Christmas Special
8.plot: A strange rock hits the earth and gives birth to Ice Panthers. Neal has to deal with his Christmas list while fighting the bad alien panthers made of alien ice.

9.title: And Prawns
9.plot: Alien Prawns come invading Earth and they can change their appearance to look like anybody they want.

10.title: Zattack and his Bot Army
10.plot: Cyborg villain Zattack is kidnapping intelligent humans to make his smart cyborg army, but what happens when he kidnaps Natasha thinking she is smart?

11.title: Fattack Attack
11.plot: Tiny Fattack Aliens are fast as light, and are attacking Earth in order to wipe the humanity literally off the planet. Neal challenges them to a race.

12.title: Epic Race Time
12.plot: Astra Force preparing for annual sports meet at their school, but their rival 'Black Team' has got a secret recipe to win the games; a strange energy drink is making the kids go mad. As things unfold, Tara gets a taste of the energy drink.

13.title: The Fugitive
13.plot: Capt Zukaan of the Space Police comes to Astra Force for help in capturing a fugitive alien, but things are not as they seem to be.

14.title: Dance Off
14.plot: Astra tells Neal and Tara about his past where he used to be a dancing sensation along with his best friend Pangoon. Our heroes visit the planet of Hakoo to meet Astra's friend, but things are not as they used to be once.

15.title: The G Gang
15.plot: Earth becomes the battleground for the Gyaan Ruby of the Ghantaal planet. Astra Force fight the evil Gundappa Ghantaal and his army of shape shifting aliens to save the planet and the precious gemstone.

16.title: Bawlin' and Brawlin'
16.plot: Neal and Tara wake up one morning to find Astra as a Baby. Now they have to take care of him while fighting bad guys who wants to make all the humans babies.

17.title: Superhero Rescue Mission
17.plot: Astra Force set out on a mission to find other superheroes who have mysteriously gone missing.

18.title: Once Upon a Time
18.plot: Neal's mistake lets Astra and Tara get trapped by Vigyaani and so now he has to team up with the Neal of the future and defeat an evil version of Tara.

19.title: Stone Age
19.plot: Astra Force are accidentally sent back in time where there survival depends on winning a talent competition.

20.title: Universal Idol
20.plot: Neal and Tara's school organizes a talent competition. But the problem arrives in the form of three Alien Teen-Mean Girls who are hell bent to win this competition by hook or crook; mostly by crook.

21.title: Action Figure Attack
21.plot: Astra Force find themselves surrounded by toys that have suddenly came to life and are hell bent on attacking the city.

22.title: Attack of the Clowns
22.plot: A circus troupe comes to town and suddenly the sweet shops are getting robbed at night. Astra Force realize that its the Circus Leader behind the robberies; who is an alien that needs sweets to stay strong.

23.title: Sneezy Shenanigans
23.plot: Astra is feeling under the weather when Stunt Master Number One attacks the city. With Astra's power intermittently going away due to the flu, how will Astra Force save the day?

24.title: Rocky Rockstar:
24.plot: Tara drags Neal and Astra to the concert of her favorite singer Rocky Rockstar where she learns that he is a runaway alien brat whose gangster father wants to take him home against his will.

25.title: Together Forever
25.plot: Neal and Tara are accidentally stuck together, and so they must learn to appreciate each other while fighting bad guys.

26.title: Trip to Antarctica
26.plot: Astra Force have to save the Antarctica's snow from two Alien brothers who want to sell it into the space black market.

27.title: Doodles and Dumdums
27.plot: Astra Force find themselves against an alien race that is taking the shapes of doodles and drawings.

28.title: Loudmouth
28.plot: A Giant Alien comes to Earth and steals the electricity and water to treat his sore throat and train himself for a singing competition. Astra Force must step up to send this big guy back home.

29.title: Selfie Attack
29.plot: The alien super villain Pout-x is capturing humans to make his slaves by using their love for selfies.

30.title: TV Trouble
30.plot: An alien race gets hooked to our TV programming so much that they start controlling the actors and presenters, making them go off the script and do horrible things.

31.title: Rango Unchained
31.plot: An old robotic villain from Astra's past comes back to get even with him, and threatens the humanity. Its up to Astra Force to dismantle this new evil.

32.title: Tree of Hope
32.plot: Astra Force get the responsibility to transport a rare plant safely to a planet that has been destroyed by rampant development.

33.title: Stache Attack
33.plot: A strange epidemic hits the city where all the kids grow big and scruffy mustaches overnight. Turns out, things are hairier than they seem as its a part of a much bigger threat.

34.title: Neal Neal Neal
34.plot: Due to an accident in Zingula's lab, all of Neal's personalities come alive. Astra and Tara now have to make Neal one again while fighting against Zingula.

35.title: Animal Farm
35.plot: The Animals of Earth suddenly evolve and revolt against the humans. Astra Force try to find out the cause and cure for this Orwellian problem.

36.title: Buster the Pup (Buster Power)
36.plot: Astra Force find Buster the Pup who becomes a member of the team, only to be kidnapped by a villain who is out to drain Astra Force's energy.

37.title: Eraser
37.plot: A spiteful alien 'Eraser' comes to the Earth to erase the humans and rule the planet. And in order to make his plan proceed smoothly, he first decides to erase Earth's mightiest heroes; Astra Force.

38.title: Multiplication Situation!
38.plot: Astra Force is bowled over by an aggressive alien species that resembles small balls and can take any shape to do what they like the most - destroying planets.

39.title: Mummy Attack
39.plot: Dr Purana brings an Egyptian Mummy back to life to get even with Astra Force, but the Mummy has his own plans of world domination.

40.title: Super Sidekick Showdown
40.plot: When an overzealous alien is turned down by Astra Force to join their team, he starts committing crimes to show how powerful he is.

41.title: What's Up in Vakoo?
41.plot: Neal and Natasha get kidnapped by an alien race along with other kids. Then they are made to run a race on a distant planet where the loser gets eaten by a giant monster.

42.title: Zopato and The Evil Ink
42.plot: An alien Zopato is taking over the world by putting people under his hypnosis, but what will Tara do when Zopato makes Astra and Neal his puppets?

43.title: Amoeba Monsters
43.plot: Astra is tricked by an Amoeba like Alien Monster into bringing him and his gang to Earth, and now its up to our heroes to fix this disaster.

44.title: Glove Attack
44.plot: An evil glove lands on earth and starts taking over its wearer to make them do its evil deeds.

45.title: Waterheist
45.plot: When a fierce alien suffers from amnesia after a fight with Astra Force, our heroes get into an ardent process of sending him away from the Earth but after him regaining his memories.

46.title: Dirty Laundry
46.plot: Tiny Koomba Aliens have attacked the Earth, and they are attaching themselves to our clothes, making them come alive. And when the clothes turn against people, its Astra Force's job to clean this mess.

47.title: Refugee Alien
47.plot: Astra Force find an alien kid whose family was enslaved by evil alien brothers Rol-X and Fer-X. Astra Force set out to help their new friends and set the evil alien smuggling villains on the right track.

48.title: Superhero Man
48.plot: Astra Force are being put out of their job when a new Superhero 'SUPERHERO MAN' appears in the city out of nowhere. But this new hero is not the saint he claims to be.

49.title: Sharkinator
49.plot: Vigyaani brings a monster that is a hybrid of a Shark and Car from another dimension, but it sets itself free. Now Astra Force have to get to it before Vigyaani enslaves it to do its evil deeds.

50.title: Superfan Shenanigans
50.plot: Neal's favorite filmmaker Johnny Filmwala is in town to audition for his next film. But little does Neal know that the film he is going to audition for is actually a plot to destroy the mankind.

51.title: We All Scream for Ice Cream
51.plot: Astra Force raid an ice cream shop where they meet two Ninja Aliens who are after an alien object that looks like the most popular ice cream.

52.title: Bizee Bees
52.plot: Swarms of Alien Bees attack the earth as they loot and plunder the city. Astra Force decide to go after these bees by shrinking Tara to their size.

imdb.plot outline: From legendary actor and icon, Amitabh Bachchan, comes ASTRA FORCE, his first animated series. A funny and fast-paced, action-adventure, superhero series, filled with laughs and thrills. When two 8-year old twin kids accidentally awaken an ancient super-warrior from the past, they must join him in saving the world from a new wave of giant monsters and a demon determined to rule the universe. For Justice, For Honor, For Ice Cream...ASTRA FORCE! Smashing baddies...in time for homework.
imdb.title: Astra Force
plot: From legendary actor and icon, Amitabh Bachchan, comes ASTRA FORCE, his first animated series. A funny and fast-paced, action-adventure, superhero series, filled with laughs and thrills. When two 8-year old twin kids accidentally awaken an ancient super-warrior from the past, they must join him in saving the world from a new wave of giant monsters and a demon determined to rule the universe. For Justice, For Honor, For Ice Cream...ASTRA FORCE! Smashing baddies...in time for homework.::Graphic India
